title: rtest1a
text: main task package dsdp estimate probability density functions data set using maximum likelihood method. models density functions use familiar Gaussian exponential distributions polynomial correction terms. call Gaussian distribution polynomial Gaussian-based model exponential distribution polynomial Exponential-based model, respectively. dsdp seeks parameters Gaussian exponential distributions together degrees polynomials using grid search, coefficients polynomials using variant semidefinite programming(SDP) problems. Detailed discussions SDP problem formulations type SDP problems found vignettes. outline estimation procedure follows. Create Gaussian-based Exponential-based model data set. Explore data set checking statistics histogram Provide set parameters Gaussian exponential distributions degrees polynomials. Estimate coefficients polynomials set parameters check results comparing Akaike Information Criterion(AIC) plotting density functions. Refine parameters repeat 3-4 sufficient estimate obtained. see process step step next section. move , please install import package haven’t yet. Installation done

title: Compute incomplete gamma — igamma
text: Evaluate incomplete gamma function: $$\gamma(, x) = \int_{0}^{x} t^{-1}\exp{-t}dt,$$ using SLATEC dgami https://netlib.org/slatec/. \(\gt 0\) \(x \ge 0\), compute result, otherwise value NaN.

title: Compute complementary incomplete gamma — igammac
text: Evaluate complementary incomplete gamma function: $$\gamma^{*}(, x) = \int_{x}^{\inf} t^{-1}\exp{-t}dt,$$ using SLATEC dgamic https://netlib.org/slatec/. \(x > 0\) \(x \eq 0 & \ge 0\), compute result, otherwise value NaN.
